document.full_text: a prominent independent documentary film festival in china, scheduled this year for may, has been canceled because of the tense atmosphere created by the continuing government crackdown on freedom of speech.
document.title: asia: china: documentary film festival is canceled
lines_and_colors: a prominent independent documentary film festival in china, scheduled this year for may, has been canceled because of the tense atmosphere created by the continuing government crackdown on freedom of speech.
